title: X2-The.Threat.LinuxGame.Iso-Trice
description:
Title: X2 - The Treath
Developer: Linux Game Publishing
Genre: Simulation
Release Date: Dec,2003
Supplier: GodFearMe
Supply Date: Mar,2007
Ripped: Bonus material, such as trailer for X3, wallpapers etc.
Rar Count: 17 x 50MB

Game information:
Return to piracy and crime, build your own trading empire, join the ranks of mercenaries, or become an ace combat pilot, commanding a fleet of starships from the bridge of your carrier. Any path is open to you.

Minimum Requirements:
Operating System: 2.2.x+ Linux kernel with glibc-2.1+ and X-Windows (XFree86 3.3.5+)
Processor: 1.5 GHz x86 Processor
Memory: 256 MB
Disc Space: 1.2 GB
Graphics Card: Hardware Accelerated 3D Graphics card with 64 MB video memory
Sound Card: OSS or ALSA Compatible

For review,screenshots etc: http://www.tuxgames.com/details.cgi?&gameref=131

Install Notes:
Unpack
Mount or burn the ISO
'sh setup.sh' to install 
'x2' to play
